item.title: Calculate Age from Birth Date in Java
item.description: In this quick tutorial, we’ll learn how to calculate the age in human-readable format in Java.

item.title: Date Difference in Human Readable format in Java
item.description: In this quick tutorial, we’ll learn how to print the difference between two dates in human-readable format in Java.
